New Records: CJ McCollum scored 50 points, a career-high for the Pelicans, with 10 three-pointers made, setting a team record.
CJ McCollum's three-point percentage improved to 37 after the game, halfway towards his goal of 40% in 10 days.
Key Match Events: CJ McCollum's 50-point performance was a key turning point in the Pelicans' 132-120 victory over the Wizards, ending an 11-game losing streak.
Post-Match Reflections: Trey Murphy praised CJ McCollum's performance, calling it 'vintage' and 'dope.' Willie Green, the coach, noted McCollum's incredible shooting and effort.
CJ McCollum reflected on his performance, attributing it to his hard work and family motivation.
Miscellaneous Highlights: CJ McCollum's recent streak of high-scoring games ties him with two other NBA players, showcasing his consistent offensive skills.
